name: Sunkenshire
description:
In this small 2D City builder, construct a city as the newly appointed manager of the city building megacorporation throughout a six scenario campaign set in a sci-fi setting where the entire world has been flooded.

Features 

  • Build a city at the bottom of the sea
  • Control a player operated submarine to explore various items/locations on the map.
  • Campaign with six missions 
  • Simple resources management through production and trade

Includes: "Fall of Floodbury" short story.

coming Soon

  • Extra animations and effects
  • More creatures (including hammerhead shark and giant clam) to add more life to the world.
  • A new scenario separate from the main campaign.
  • Tweaks and improvements to existing features.
